title: Fitness: The secret to aging exceptionally well
author: Jill Barker
blurb: The story of an 82-year-old Italian who decided to take up triathlon at the age of 75 shows it's never too late to become more active.

title: CSSDM suspends 11 teachers at Bedford school over 'toxic' climate
author: No author found
blurb: “Support staff are hard at work on a game plan to re-establish a healthy and safe climate at Bedford school," Education Minister Bernard Drainville says.

title: Two men injured in C.D.N.-N.D.G. stabbing Saturday evening
author: No author found
blurb: One of the victims, a 42-year-old man, was hospitalized in critical condition.

title: Clifford Lincoln: Men keep waging war. It's high time for more women to lead the world
author: Clifford Lincoln
blurb: We live with too many conflicts, too many wars and too many men in charge.

title: Bilingual Quebec communities lose bid to suspend Bill 96 rules
author: No author found
blurb: Quebec Superior Court has denied a request for a temporary injunction, saying the municipalities had not proved serious or irreparable damage.
